SDG_GOAL: Goal 7: Ensure access to affordable, reliable, sustainable and modern energy for all
SDG_TARGET: Target 7.3: By 2030, double the global rate of improvement in energy efficiency
SDG_INDICATOR: Indicator 7.3.1: Energy intensity measured in terms of primary energy and GDP
STAT_CONC_DEF: Energy intensity is defined as the energy supplied to the economy per unit value of economic output.
